import React, { Component } from "react"; import {defaultStyle} from "./styleFunctions"; import avatar from "../assets/imgs/avatar_d.svg" import logo from '../assets/imgs/logo.png'; class HeaderOrganizador extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bank: [], events: [], user: [] } } componentDidMount(){ require( '../assets/js/jquery.secretnav' ); var user = localStorage.getItem('user'); var banks = localStorage.getItem('banks'); var events = localStorage.getItem('events'); user = JSON.parse(user); if(user) { this.setState({ bank: banks, events: events, user: user }) } } render() { return(
